SELECT DISTINCT b.permission from user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN role_button_relation br on br.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_button b ON b.id = br.button_id where r.user_id = #{userId} AND b.permission is not null AND b.permission != '' AND sr.enabled = 1 AND b.enabled = 1 group by b.id
SELECT id from system_button where enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort_no

SELECT m.id FROM system_user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN system_role_button_relation mr ON mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_button m ON m.id = mr.button_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.sort_no
